segments.advisor_message: So, going back to dependents, can you tell me the name of your dependent?
segments.client_message: Oh, yeah, umm, it’s like, uh, Sarah, I think, that’s it!

segments.advisor_message: Great! And when was Sarah born?
segments.client_message: Umm, I think, uh, she was born on, like, 15-08-2010, I guess?

segments.advisor_message: Thanks for that! Is there a date until when Sarah will be considered a dependent?
segments.client_message: Oh, umm, yeah, that would be until, like, 15-08-2028? I’m really excited about, uh, investing for her future growth and stuff!
